parse: Conjunctive waw | Noun - proper - masculine singular
str2: Azariah -- 'Yah has helped', the name of a number of Israelites

parse: Verb - Hifil - Perfect - third person masculine singular
str2: To bear young, to beget, medically, to act as midwife, to show lineage
Seraiah -- 'Yah persists', the name of a number of Israelites
